job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Are you a software consultant who has relied on LLMs to make life easier for most of your career? Are you afraid your hard skills will atrophy if you continue spending most of your day on low-skill tasks? Jigsaw is revolutionizing consulting by harnessing the power of AI to cut through the noise and let you focus on what truly matters: delivering high-impact results for clients. If you're driven by innovation and want to be at the forefront of AI-enhanced project delivery, this role is tailor-made for you.

   Jigsaw is fundamentally rethinking how projects are delivered, using generative AI to automate the mundane and elevate the strategic. Say goodbye to the grind of manual configuration, which you are overqualified to do anyway, and hello to a world where AI does the heavy lifting, freeing you to focus on building systems and delivering unparalleled client service.

   This isn't your average consulting gig. If you're looking to spend your days entrenched in manual tasks, this isn't the job for you. Instead, we need someone who thrives on using AI to push boundaries, someone who relishes the challenge of aligning technology with client business goals. You'll be advising on everything from survey design to panel creation, all while ensuring that the solutions you deliver are flawlessly aligned with client expectations.

   Join us if you're excited by the idea of transforming the consulting landscape, if you want to leave behind the old ways and embrace a role where your strategic input has real, measurable impact. This is your chance to be part of a team that's not just keeping up with the future of consulting but defining it. If that sounds like you, we want to hear from you.

   What you will be doing

     * AI-Enhanced Project Delivery: Using generative AI to improve project delivery, customer communications, and validation of project deliverables.
     * Consulting Services: Gathering and analyzing customer business requirements, advising on survey structure, best practices for panel creation, and training clients on the software platform.
     * Configuration Services: Configuring surveys, panels, and data gathering processes within the software platform.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Manually reviewing every knowledge base article and Excel trackers
     * Creating slide decks
     * Traveling to client sites
     * Coding or programming
job_details.full_text:
Implementation Engineer, Jigsaw (Remote) - $60,000/year USD

Are you a software consultant who has relied on LLMs to make life easier for most of your career? Are you afraid your hard skills will atrophy if you continue spending most of your day on low-skill tasks? Jigsaw is revolutionizing consulting by harnessing the power of AI to cut through the noise and let you focus on what truly matters: delivering high-impact results for clients. If you're driven by innovation and want to be at the forefront of AI-enhanced project delivery, this role is tailor-made for you.

   Jigsaw is fundamentally rethinking how projects are delivered, using generative AI to automate the mundane and elevate the strategic. Say goodbye to the grind of manual configuration, which you are overqualified to do anyway, and hello to a world where AI does the heavy lifting, freeing you to focus on building systems and delivering unparalleled client service.

   This isn't your average consulting gig. If you're looking to spend your days entrenched in manual tasks, this isn't the job for you. Instead, we need someone who thrives on using AI to push boundaries, someone who relishes the challenge of aligning technology with client business goals. You'll be advising on everything from survey design to panel creation, all while ensuring that the solutions you deliver are flawlessly aligned with client expectations.

   Join us if you're excited by the idea of transforming the consulting landscape, if you want to leave behind the old ways and embrace a role where your strategic input has real, measurable impact. This is your chance to be part of a team that's not just keeping up with the future of consulting but defining it. If that sounds like you, we want to hear from you.

   What you will be doing

     * AI-Enhanced Project Delivery: Using generative AI to improve project delivery, customer communications, and validation of project deliverables.
     * Consulting Services: Gathering and analyzing customer business requirements, advising on survey structure, best practices for panel creation, and training clients on the software platform.
     * Configuration Services: Configuring surveys, panels, and data gathering processes within the software platform.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Manually reviewing every knowledge base article and Excel trackers
     * Creating slide decks
     * Traveling to client sites
     * Coding or programming

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on the *use* of AI tools to enhance productivity and deliver client services, rather than on the development, fine-tuning, or deep technical implementation of AI models or systems. It explicitly states 'Coding or programming' is not part of the role, and while it mentions 'generative AI' and 'AI-enhanced project delivery', it lacks the core technical tasks and technologies associated with ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer profiles, such as algorithm development, model training, MLOps, or specific AI framework usage. The emphasis is on consulting and leveraging AI as a tool, fitting the definition of 'Ambiguous' for roles primarily focused on the use of AI tools to enhance productivity.

job_tasks.justification: The role involves gathering and analyzing customer business requirements, advising on survey structure, and aligning solutions with client expectations and business goals, which are core to understanding the business context.
job_tasks.phrase: Gathering and analyzing customer business requirements

job_tasks.justification: The role requires advising clients on best practices and aligning technology solutions with client business goals, demonstrating a need for business understanding.
job_tasks.phrase: advising on survey structure, best practices for panel creation

job_tasks.justification: The job emphasizes transforming the consulting landscape and defining the future of consulting through AI, indicating a strategic business focus.
job_tasks.phrase: Jigsaw is revolutionizing consulting by harnessing the power of AI

job_tasks.justification: The role requires aligning technology with client business goals, a key aspect of business understanding.
job_tasks.phrase: aligning technology with client business goals

job_tasks.justification: The job explicitly mentions using 'generative AI' to improve project delivery, customer communications, and validation, implying the application of generative models, even if not building them from scratch.

job_tasks.justification: The role involves configuring surveys, panels, and data gathering processes within a software platform, which can be considered a form of system configuration and setup, though it explicitly states 'Coding or programming' is not involved.
job_tasks.phrase: Configuring surveys, panels, and data gathering processes within the software platform

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions freeing up the consultant to focus on 'building systems', which aligns with software development, although the explicit exclusion of coding is noted.
